rooms.description: Chettinad-style living room with decorative arches and traditional motifs, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the West-facing wall to maximize natural light.
Chettinad-style dining room with traditional Chettinad design elements and a central chandelier, floor-to-ceiling windows on the West side for ambient light.
Modern farmhouse kitchen with traditional touches, integrated with a pantry area. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide natural ventilation and light.
First floor bathroom, featuring minimalist design with traditional finishes and proper ventilation from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Spacious balcony adjacent to the living room for relaxation and natural light. Designed with traditional Chettinad elements.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony designed according to Vastu principles; positioned in the South-East quadrant, ensuring optimal energy flow and privacy.
Secondary bedroom with a dedicated balcony and Vastu-compliant placement for balance and harmony; positioned in the South-West quadrant.

openings.description: Primary entrance on the East side with a traditional Chettinad archway, ensuring smooth transition and Vastu compliance.
Secondary exit leading to an outdoor space or garden area for added security and ventilation.
Staircase connecting ground floor to upper levels, designed with Vastu principles in mind to promote flow of energy.
